    • Constructor Detail

      • PhotoController

        public PhotoController()

    • Method Detail

      • createAlbumClicked

        public void createAlbumClicked()
        Method to call when the "Create Album" button is clicked. The button is only visible if the Photo window was entered via search results. Shows the add new album dialog to rename the new album.

      • backButtonClicked

        public void backButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Back" button is clicked. Starts the Album window with the current user.

      • slideshowButtonClicked

        public void slideshowButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Slideshow" button is clicked. Starts the slideshow button with the selected photo, displays an error dialog if no photo was selected.

      • addButtonClicked

        public void addButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Add" button is clicked. Opens up a file chooser and checks if selected file is an invalid photo format. Also checks if the album already contains the selected photo. An error dialog is shown if the above conditions are met. Adds the selected photo to the album upon success.

      • deleteButtonClicked

        public void deleteButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Delete" button is clicked. Removes the selected photo from the album, error dialog is shown if no photo was selected.

      • editButtonClicked

        public void editButtonClicked()
        Method to call when the "Edit" button is clicked. Shows the edit photo dialog for the selected photo, error dialog is shown if no photo was selected.

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.Object obj,
                 int index)
        Initializes the Photo window upon first start up.
        Specified by:
        init in class Controller
        Parameters:
        obj - album that was opened
        index - mode that the photo window was opened either from a normal album open, or a search result
